comment.p: I am very pleased with the quality of service that I received from every part of Bentham Science, including your journal, Current Drug Discovery Technologies. First, let me thank you and the editor for inviting me to submit a review article. The 2nd edition was written as a text for the first semester of the two semester course in medicinal chemistry that is taught in pharmacy schools around the world. Bentham Science is doing a great job of helping my books reach the market.

At the same time, the article I wrote for Current Drug Discovery Technologies gave me an opportunity to reach a broader audience than the one that I reach in my research on food and natural products chemistry at the FDA. It also gave me the opportunity to review the very important subject of allo-network drugs, which has emerged recently and is described in more detail in the 3rd edition. The review process was fast and efficient. It caught the mistakes that I made and recommended several important improvements. The final proofs look excellent.

The other thing that Bentham Science has done for me is to greatly increase my scientific reputation, which has led to several other publishers inviting me to write review articles for them. In conclusion, Bentham Science continues to support my career and I hope that you have found me to be a valuable contributor.

comment.p: As being a Diabetes research scientist and researcher, it was a great pleasure working with one of the Bentham Science Publications, “Recent Patents on Endocrine, Metabolic & Immune Drug Discovery 2013.
The “quick” response from the journal publication team at every step was one of the unique characteristics as compared to other international journals.

Right from the submission till the actual publication of my manuscript, I felt that the journal’s staff is very responsible and serious towards the researchers and their work, keeping me informed and involved at every step. Apart from the quick response, the overall guidance provided by the journal’s publication team was commendable. There were no unnecessary details, and the cordial environment makes the researchers more comfortable throughout the process of publication.

After the publication, offers/trial send by the staff to the authors encourage them towards further research and publication submissions. I had never been offered these unique post-publication services by any other publishers before. This ensures that the Bentham Science team will remain in contact with the authors and researches even after the publication process is over.

I will recommend the journals to my colleagues to consider for publishing their own work. In future as well, I will consider the journal “Recent Patents on Endocrine, Metabolic & Immune Drug Discovery” for submitting my original research.
